resources.string: Countries are sorted by total cases
Keeps you updated with all coronavirus statistics

This application does not collect any personal information.

Developer does not allow advertising companies to collect data through his service for ad targeting.

The privacy policy was last updated on 21/04/2020. It may change from time to time. If any material changes to this policy will be made, AdiJr will place a prominent notice within the application.

The application icon is made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
